responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "766A0D5F4259B490806489B7ECAA6312", "It was then that Muckbeard\'s healers left him dying, while the stubborn mage invoked the shadow of Atrax, and none could stop his wrath upon himself. He watched as they turned their backs on him and exited the doorway to his chambers. The evil which he had warded off in his life took hold of him from within. He had scarcely begun his path to glory when the night sky clouded over his will.")
name: MADD_0010_MBD_Soulstone2_11
